title: Boxed's Huang on Amex Investment, Competing With AMZN (Audio)
itunes:title: Boxed's Huang on Amex Investment, Competing With AMZN (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Chieh Huang, CEO of Boxed.com, on the outlook for its bulk delivery business, competing with Amazon-- and why the company will pay for the weddings of all full-time employees.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
